H2087.gloss: Pride that exalts self and deceives the heart.
H2087.short: Pride is deceptive confidence in self that replaces trust in the Lord.
H2087.longHtml:
Pride (H2087)

Pride is not just arrogance. It shows up in what I trust to keep me safe and comfortable. Obadiah exposes how pride deceives, making me feel secure when I am actually vulnerable before God.
